body.p: The Board believes that reputational risk is part of an investor’s exposure to risks and rewards, albeit a risk that arises from non‑contractual sources. For that reason, the Board concluded that when assessing control, reputational risk is a factor to consider along with other facts and circumstances. It is not an indicator of power in its own right, but may increase an investor’s incentive to secure rights that give the investor power over an investee.
